message: I'll start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game.
You started high, I'll start low. Your turn to make a counteroffer!
Too low, I'll try to squeeze more out of you.
You're low, I'll meet you in the middle.
I'll try to get closer to my target. Your turn again!
Still too low, I'll push for more.
It's getting late, let's meet in the middle and end this.
I'm getting closer to my target, but still room for negotiation. Your turn again!
Still too low, I'll try to squeeze more out of you.
I'm getting desperate, but I'll try to get a slightly better deal.
I'm not getting any younger, but I still want a better deal. Last chance for you to make a move!
Still too low, I'll try to make one last push.
This is my last serious offer, take it or leave it.
I'm not backing down. This is my final offer, take it or we walk away with nothing.
Fine, I'll accept your offer. Let's end this.
